title: Women and a man held on suspicion of murder in Croydon
description: A man dies and two other men are taken to hospital after a stabbing in south London.
content:
Two women and a man have been arrested on suspicion of murder after a man was stabbed to death in a retail park in south London.
Police were called to Hesterman Way on the Valley Retail Park in Croydon at about 01:15 GMT on Sunday where three men wer... [258 chars]

title: British and German military chiefs press ‘moral’ case for rearmament
description: Defence leaders write joint appeal urging public on need to be prepared for war with Russia and resulting costs
content:
Britain and Germany’s highest ranking military leaders have made an unprecedented joint appeal to the public to accept the “moral” case for rearmament and prepare for the threat of war with Russia.

title: Wales vs France LIVE: Watch Six Nations 2026
description: Watch live BBC One coverage and follow radio and text commentary as Wales host defending champions France at Principality Stadium.
content:
Goodbye from Cardiff
FT: Wales 12-54 France
That's it from Cardiff, where it went as expected with a comprehensive French win in front of a huge travelling support.

title: Large crowd involved in street brawl near popular Bristol pub

content:

title: Starmer told: prove you’re not complicit in smear campaign
description: PM faces questions from within own party over anti-journalist investigation ordered by Labour Together
content:
Sir Keir Starmer has been challenged to prove that he was not complicit in a Labour smear campaign against journalists.
